com.solacesystems.poc

Interface StatefulFTEventListener


  • public interface StatefulFTEventListener

    Interface for applications interested in joining a shared Solace FT-Cluster and receiving FT state change events reflecting the state of your application's membership in the cluster.

    This interface differs from the FTEventListener, in the event this listener becomes the Active member, the StatefulFTMgr tries to return the last message output from the previous Active member of the FT-Cluster in the onActive(BytesXMLMessage) handler event. This allows the application to be more stateful in accounting for the state of the application while it was not in Active mode.

    See also StatefulFTMgr, FTMgr, FTEventListener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onActive(com.solacesystems.jcsmp.BytesXMLMessage solaceMessage)
      Invoked by the FTMgr when this listening application becomes the Active member of the cluster.
      void onBackup()
      Invoked by the FTMgr when this listening application changes to become a Backup member of the cluster.

    • Method Detail

        void onActive(com.solacesystems.jcsmp.BytesXMLMessage solaceMessage)
        Invoked by the FTMgr when this listening application becomes the Active member of the cluster.
        Parameters:
        solaceMessage - The last state output from the previous Active member.

      • onBackup

        void onBackup()
        Invoked by the FTMgr when this listening application changes to become a Backup member of the cluster.
